sentences.english: Has manifested the very strong lethality.
You beat word too injuriously, again to break my heart.

sentences.english: Practise martial arts person has to need to have skill , then it is possible let self move style have antipersonnel force.

sentences.english: Bazookas have a long range and are very destructive, they make a strong contribution in wars.

sentences.english: The promotion may say is in the present China market most has one of lethality weapons.

sentences.english: His backhand with the penhold-grip has especially improved and become more accurate and powerful.
sentences.chinese: 特別是他的反手直拍已經日益完善，有很強的殺傷力。

sentences.english: The Shot Pistol has two barrels and fires buckshot rounds creating a wider firing cone and high damage up close.
sentences.chinese: 擁有雙管的散彈手槍，範圍攻擊，越近殺傷力越高。

sentences.english: Stalemate segment capacity is relatively poor, are lethal backhand is not strong.
